revised_title: Observations on the Development of Semilunar Valves in Chick Heart
tldr: The author investigates the development of semilunar valves in the chick heart, providing insights into the division of the truncus arteriosus and the formation of the aorta and pulmonary artery. The study contributes to understanding congenital malformations of the heart and sheds light on the development of semilunar valves in humans and mammals.
